reuters.title: SOUTHOLD SAVINGS BANK <SDSB.O> 3RD QTR NET
reuters.body: Shr 50 cts Net 2,751,000 vs 2,094,000 Nine mths Net 6,993,000 vs 5,577,000 Assets 603.1 mln vs 504.3 mln Loans 448.5 mln vs 358.1 mln Deposits 467.9 mln vs 447.7 mln NOTE: Per share figures for 1986 and 1987 nine mths not available as bank converted to stock form of company in April 1987. Reuter 
